title: TUESDAY - Coaching changes 2021
itunes:title: TUESDAY - Coaching changes 2021
description:
The Giants missing out on a playoff spot after the Eagles lost to Washington. New York head coach Joe Judge not happy (0:43) about Doug Pederson's decision to pull Jalen Hurts trailing by only three points, but Ron Rivera unapologetic about making the playoffs (1:15). The Browns lose a key piece of their defense (1:55) heading into their wild card matchup with the Steelers. Two more head coaches fired on Monday (2:52) as we look at some of the hot candidates (3:10) to potentially fill those voids and others

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
